alert.note: Alert for Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 3:18AM PST until January 17 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 5000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. South winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Lincoln County above 5000 feet. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snow between 3 and 6 inches is possible on Highway 93 east of Caliente and north of Pioche, State Route 319 east of Panaca, and State Route 322 north of Ursine, resulting in dangerous road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
